message.content:
cs.SD, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.SDQ 

The paper deals with automatic speech recognition (ASR) systems and proposes a method to improve their performance in the presence of cross-talk. This falls under the sub-category of speech processing and recognition (cs.SD). The paper also uses deep learning techniques, which are commonly used in natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning (cs.CL, cs.LG). Additionally, the paper deals with data simulation, which falls under the sub-category of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and signal processing (cs.SI). Finally, the paper investigates the application of deep clustering to sparsely overlapping speech, which could fall under the sub-category of speech enhancement (cs.SDQ).
